description: Log sleep duration, quality, and patterns for sleep tracking and analysis

sleep_start.description: When you went to bed (ISO 8601 timestamp)

duration_hours.description: Total sleep duration in hours (optional, calculated from start/end)

notes.description: Notes about sleep (e.g., 'woke up 2 times', 'vivid dreams')

sync_from_fitbit.description: If true, sync sleep data from Fitbit instead of manual entry
